calculator.title: Immersion Cooling TCO Calculator
calculator.subtitle: Compare total cost of ownership between air cooling and immersion cooling systems
calculator.description: Analyze the financial benefits of immersion cooling technology for your data center deployment.
calculator.confirm_reset: Are you sure you want to reset all configuration? This action cannot be undone.
calculator.calculating_description: This may take a few moments to process your configuration.

shortcuts.help: Use Ctrl+→ (Next), Ctrl+← (Previous), Ctrl+R (Reset) for keyboard navigation

air_cooling.title: Air Cooling Configuration
air_cooling.description: Configure your traditional air cooling system parameters

immersion_cooling.title: Immersion Cooling Configuration
immersion_cooling.description: Configure your immersion cooling system parameters

financial.title: Financial Parameters
financial.description: Set financial analysis parameters and regional settings

review.title: Review & Calculate
review.description: Review your configuration and run the TCO analysis

results.title: TCO Analysis Results
results.description: View your comprehensive cost analysis and savings projections

air_cooling.title: Air Cooling System Configuration
air_cooling.description: Configure the parameters for your traditional air cooling data center infrastructure. This includes rack specifications, power distribution, and HVAC systems.

input_method.title: Configuration Method
input_method.rack_count_desc: Specify the number of racks and power per rack
input_method.total_power_desc: Specify the total power consumption directly

rack_count.label: Number of Racks
rack_count.helper: Total number of 42U server racks in your deployment

power_per_rack.label: Power per Rack (kW)
power_per_rack.helper: Average power consumption per rack including servers and networking

total_power.label: Total Power Consumption (kW)
total_power.helper: Total power consumption of all IT equipment

hvac_efficiency.label: HVAC System Efficiency
hvac_efficiency.tooltip: Efficiency of your cooling system (0.5-0.95). Higher values indicate more efficient cooling systems.

power_efficiency.label: Power Distribution Efficiency
power_efficiency.tooltip: Efficiency of UPS and power distribution systems (0.8-0.98). Includes losses in transformers, UPS, and PDUs.

space_efficiency.label: Space Utilization Efficiency
space_efficiency.tooltip: Percentage of data center space used for IT equipment (0.6-0.95). Accounts for aisles, maintenance space, and infrastructure.

immersion_cooling.title: Immersion Cooling System Configuration
immersion_cooling.description: Configure the parameters for your immersion cooling deployment. Immersion cooling provides superior energy efficiency by directly cooling servers in dielectric fluid.

input_method.title: Configuration Method
input_method.auto_optimize_desc: Automatically determine optimal tank configuration for your power requirements
input_method.manual_config_desc: Manually specify tank sizes, quantities, and power densities

target_power.label: Target Power Capacity (kW)
target_power.helper: Total power capacity you want to achieve with immersion cooling

immersion_cooling.optimization_complete: Optimization complete! Review the recommended configuration below.

power_density.label: Power Density (kW/U)
power_density.helper: Power consumption per rack unit (1U = 1.75 inches)

immersion_cooling.no_tanks_configured: No tanks configured yet. Click 'Add Tank Configuration' to get started.

pumping_efficiency.label: Pumping System Efficiency
pumping_efficiency.tooltip: Efficiency of coolant circulation pumps (0.8-0.98). Higher efficiency reduces parasitic power consumption.

heat_exchanger_efficiency.label: Heat Exchanger Efficiency
heat_exchanger_efficiency.tooltip: Efficiency of heat rejection system (0.85-0.98). Determines how effectively heat is removed from the coolant.

financial.title: Financial Analysis Parameters
financial.description: Configure the financial parameters for your TCO analysis including regional costs, analysis period, and economic assumptions.

energy_cost.label: Energy Cost per kWh
energy_cost.helper: Local electricity cost including demand charges and taxes

labor_cost.label: Labor Cost per Hour
labor_cost.helper: Fully-loaded cost for technical staff including benefits

analysis_years.label: Analysis Period (Years)
analysis_years.helper: Time horizon for TCO analysis (typically 3-7 years)

discount_rate.label: Discount Rate (%)
discount_rate.helper: Corporate discount rate for NPV calculations

energy_escalation.label: Energy Cost Escalation
energy_escalation.tooltip: Annual rate of increase for energy costs (typically 2-4%)

maintenance_escalation.label: Maintenance Cost Escalation
maintenance_escalation.tooltip: Annual rate of increase for maintenance costs (typically 2-3%)

preview.title: Configuration Preview
preview.configure_to_see_preview: Complete the configuration to see live preview

air_cooling.title: Air Cooling Help
air_cooling.description: Get help with configuring air cooling parameters

immersion_cooling.title: Immersion Cooling Help
immersion_cooling.description: Get help with configuring immersion cooling parameters

financial.title: Financial Parameters Help
financial.description: Get help with financial analysis settings

results.title: TCO Analysis Results
results.description: Comprehensive analysis comparing air cooling vs immersion cooling total cost of ownership

environmental.title: Environmental Benefits
environmental.description: Immersion cooling provides significant environmental improvements through energy efficiency.
environmental.carbon_equivalent: This carbon footprint reduction is equivalent to removing approximately {cars} cars from the road annually.

reports.download_ready: Your report is ready for download

sharing.title: Share TCO Analysis
sharing.description: Share your TCO analysis results with colleagues and stakeholders
sharing.email_subject: TCO Analysis: Immersion vs Air Cooling
sharing.email_body: Please review the attached TCO analysis comparing immersion cooling vs air cooling systems.
